title: gg ping

replies.body: Possibly your Internet Service Provider being slow, or someone is sending files (like on Skype) (or at least for me when I do that it slows down my wifi).
replies.body_tagged: Possibly your Internet Service Provider being slow, or someone is sending files (like on Skype) (or at least for me when I do that it slows down my wifi).

replies.body: If your ping is high to any server you connect, it's most likely your ISP ^
replies.body_tagged: If your ping is high to any server you connect, it's most likely your ISP ^

replies.body:
That pings not that bad, mine (generally) ranges from 480ms to 850ms. I got 2755ms on multiple occasions ;(

australia ftl
